header.description: This plugin provides a step to inject xml into an Atom Feed file.

step-type.name: Inject Entry
step-type.description: Inject an Entry into an Atom Feed xml file.

property-ui.label: Atom Feed URL
property-ui.description: Full URL to download the complete Atom XML Feed.

property-ui.label: ID
property-ui.description: Identifier for the Atom Feed Entry.

property-ui.label: Title
property-ui.description: Title for the Atom Feed Entry.

property-ui.label: Summary
property-ui.description: Description for the Atom Feed Entry.

property-ui.label: Link
property-ui.description: Link for the Atom Feed Entry.

property-ui.label: Atom Feed Index
property-ui.description: Index to insert the Entry. An empty value will result in adding the entry as the top child. Typically, the listing of Entries begins after the Atom Feed's general information.
